name: On The Hustle
description:
You got to get to work but you lost your apartment keys. You're now angry. So you start breaking everything to build up enough rage and testosterone to break down the door. Unfortunately, your cat seems to have its way to calm you down.  

Controls:

W,A,S,D - To Move

Space - To Jump

Left Mouse Button - To Destroy Items with your awesome briefcase and also calm your cat.

Panikos Theodosiou - Game Designer/Programmer

Hangarter - Game Programmer/Artist/Musician

Entry for the Global Game Jam 2022
